property.name: color
property.description: Menu text color

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image or gradient

property.name: font
property.description: Menu font

property.name: border
property.description: The border that is drawn around menus.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for menus.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for menus.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for menus.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for menus.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the menu. A value between 0 and 1.

property.name: padding
property.description: Space between border and text / image

property.name: animation
property.description: Supports animations-types "slideIn" and "slideOut". Others are ignored.

property.name: box-shadow
property.description: The shadow behind the menu.

property.name: color
property.description: Menu item text color

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the item. A value between 0 and 1.

property.name: text-shadow
property.description: Shadow for text.

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding (inner distance) for menu items.

style.name: PUSH
style.description: Style constant for push menu item behavior.

style.name: CHECK
style.description: Style constant for check box menu item behavior.

style.name: RADIO
style.description: Style constant for radio button menu item behavior.

style.name: SEPARATOR
style.description: Style constant for separator menu item behavior.

style.name: CASCADE
style.description: Style constant for cascade menu item behavior.

state.name: pressed
state.description: On mouse down and open submenu. Only for menu-bars.

state.name: onMenuBar
state.description: Applies to menu items in the menu bar.

element.name: MenuItem-CheckIcon
element.description: Icon of the checkbox. Applies when the MenuItem has a SWT.CHECK style flag.

property.name: background-image
property.description: The icon image. The maximum size of the image should be 16 x 16 pixels.

state.name: disabled
state.description: Applies when the menu is disabled.

element.name: MenuItem-RadioIcon
element.description: Icon of the radio-button. Applies when the MenuItem has a SWT.RADIO style flag.

property.name: background-image
property.description: The icon image. The maximum size of the image should be 16 x 16 pixels.

state.name: disabled
state.description: Applies when the menu is disabled.

element.name: MenuItem-CascadeIcon
element.description: The cascade icon. Applies when the MenuItem has a SWT.CASCADE style flag.

property.name: background-image
property.description: The icon image. The maximum size of the image should be 16 x 16 pixels.

style.name: RIGHT_TO_LEFT
style.description: Indicates that the menu is oriented right to left.

state.name: disabled
state.description: Applies when the menu is disabled.
